    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(Entity other)
      Handles the collision event with another entity If the other entity is a coin, the player's money is increased If the player has a shield, the shield is deactivated upon collision If the player does not have a shield, the player's ship explodes
      Specified by:
      onCollision in class Entity
      Parameters:
      other - The other entity

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)
      Updates the player's state This includes handling movement and firing projectiles
      Specified by:
      update in interface IGameObject
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time elapsed since the last update, in seconds.
